website_summaries.verdict: Choose this one if saving a bit of money on a spacious griddle is important to you; but the results you get may not be worth the savings.
pros: A large, spacious iron griddle that's pre-seasoned and reversible
Has ample-sized edges to catch grease
Comes at slightly lower price point than others in its class
cons: Several owners gripe that it doesn't cook evenly - gets hotter in the middle than around the edges

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money: buy LODGE
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save a few bucks by buying this off-brand Vremi griddle instead of Lodge. I already own a Lodge and wanted a second griddle as a back up for when I'm serving a crowd. This Vremi version is not well seasoned: it arrives black, but the surface has a very rough texture (unlike Lodge, which comes smooth and pre-seasoned like a centuries old well seasoned iron skillet) When seasoned properly, a good iron pan is naturally non-stick. Even when oiled, absolutely EVERYTHING sticks to this Vremi pan. Also, it has a slightly smaller cooking surface than the LODGE. I wish I would have just spent the extra ~$10 and bought the Lodge.

customer_reviews.title: Pancakes, potatos and so much more to cook!
customer_reviews.text: We took this camping. It was really nice because we basically were able to use just this almost the entire time. We could cook anything on it and it fit right on top of our coleman camp stove. Cooked sausage links and rolled them into the edges while we cooked the pancakes. You could put it over the fire too, but this was easier. We will use it at home on our BBQ and on our gas stove. Love that it has 2 different styles in one! Nice addition and doesn't take up too much space! It is quite heavy, but thats what you get with cast iron.

product_meta.title: Vremi 20 inch Large Nonstick Cast Iron Griddle for Kitchen Stove Top - Two Burner Flat Pancake Grill Griddle Pan - Pre-seasoned and Reversible - Portable for Indoor Oven Gas Stovetop or Outdoor BBQ
product_meta.description:
For award-winning pancakes, gold star quesadillas and more, the Vremi Heavyweight Champ Cast Iron Griddle is the ultimate kitchen warrior. Featuring 20 inches of a pre-seasoned cooking area, it gives you plenty of room to cook more of a meal without using 2-3 pans. Designed with built-in side grip handles for secure transport, and a grease slope for capturing excess fat, it also slowly cooks foods evenly without scorching to deliver healthy, chef-quality, cast iron deliciousness. Use the smooth flat griddle side for everything from eggs to grilled cheese panini. Flip it over to the grill side, and sear your way to a juicy steak, BBQ ribs or veggie kabobs. Our universal and portable 2 sided griddle grill is built for dual burner gas stovetops.

Product Details & Care 

 * Made from premium cast iron
 * Reversible with smooth griddle side and ridged grill side
 * Pre-seasoned for convenience out of the box
 * Measures 19.75 x 10 inches
 * Suited for double burner gas stovetops
 * Built-in handles for easier lifting
 * Grease slope on each side for healthier cooking
 * To clean, hand wash with gentle soap and dry thoroughly
 * Never use abrasive cleaners or clean in dishwasher
 * To reseason, heat in oven, brush with cooking oil, cover with tin foil, reheat in oven, and wipe dry when cool
 * For full care instructions and safety warnings, always refer to Vremi product box and manual
feature_bullets: VERSATILE TWO-SIDED GRIDDLE GRILL - This large, flat, reversible grilling pan features a smooth griddle side for pancakes and a ridged grill side creating classic grill marks for steak and sausages. Great for knocking out grilled treats day or night

PRE-SEASONED with EVEN HEATING -This universal grill plate pan is pre-seasoned for flavor so you can enjoy seared meats or grilled vegetables right away. Its cast iron surface slowly cooks to distribute heat evenly for chef quality meals anytime

DESIGNED with GREASE SLOPES to TRAP FAT - Both sides of this large rectangular cast iron grill skillet feature a naturally non-stick surface and grease slopes to drain off fat in food to deliver healthy meals that are both nutritious and delicious

PORTABLE with a BUILT IN HANDLE - This camp griddle pan's versatility for various recipes makes it a winner! It includes sturdy built-in side handles for a secure and convenient transfer from a stovetop to oven to even a small outdoor campfire

FOR DOUBLE BURNER GAS COOKTOPS - This 19.75 x 10" griddle is large and sturdy enough to cover two burners on an indoor gas range for stovetop BBQ cooking. To clean, hand wash and dry thoroughly to prevent rusting (allow to cool fully before cleaning)
